title: How to get Solo Q prefrence from Dynamic q prefrence?
body:
So I currently have Dynamic q prefrence, having played around a little bit more than half with a duo q partner since the badges came out.

How many Solo Q wins would I need to get to change my badge to a Solo Q badge?

replies.body:
There's no set amount for how many wins in the last 25 you need to rep the Solo Q emblem, but as *Lew* mentioned, it needs to be the **vast majority** of your wins from the last 25 wins in total.

If you haven't already, I strongly suggest checking out our [Ranked Emblems Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209346066-Ranked-Emblems) Let me know if you have any other questions.
Specifically, 2 games as a duo are enough to give you the Dynamic badge.

The [system ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209346066-Ranked-Emblems)looks at your most last 25 wins and to get a solo emblem you need to have the vast majority of games be solo queue only.

Dude i was wondering the same thing because ive been playing solo for a long time and played duo for like 3 or 4 games last night nd went from "solo pref" badge to "dynamic pref" and i dont understand why it would be dynamic pref anyway im only playing with one other person and in old solo q you were able to duo so i think they should make a new badge for duoing
